mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERFILES (FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORINAME) VALUES (#{fileNum}, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME=#{name}, EMAIL=#{email}, PHONE=#{phone} WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERFILES MF USING(ID) WHERE M.ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
